content: Embed a room selector to allow users to access any room from the list of the available ones.

comment.text: The "RoomSelectorDescription" translation key provides a brief description to be used when displaying an image and title for a room selector button in the Portal Settings page. The text is meant to describe the purpose of this feature: allowing users to access any room from a list of available ones.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation significantly alters the meaning of the English content. The English text refers to allowing users to access rooms, while the Arabic translation implies access to documents stored within a public room without logging in. It introduces an action ('viewing documents') and a condition ('without logging in') that are not present in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتضمين منتقي الغرف للسماح للمستخدمين بالوصول إلى أي غرفة من قائمة الغرف المتاحة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'مستندات' (documents) might not be the most accurate translation in this context, depending on the specific functionality of the room selector. It could be too specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more generic term like 'محتوى' (content) or 'الغرف' (rooms) if 'مستندات' is not suitable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "да имат достъп" (to have access) sounds slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would be "да получат достъп" (to gain access) or simply "за достъп" (to access).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вградете селектор на стая, за да позволите на потребителите да получат достъп до всяка стая от списъка с наличните.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Vložení selektoru místností" is a bit literal and less natural. While technically correct, it reads awkwardly. A more natural phrasing would focus on the *function* of the room selector.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Použijte selektor místností, který umožní uživatelům...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'libovolné místnosti' could be more concise. 'Jakékoliv místnosti' or 'každé místnosti' might sound more fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Použijte 'jakékoliv místnosti' or 'každé místnosti' instead of 'libovolné místnosti'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Embed" is too literal. "Betten Sie eine Raumauswahl ein" sounds unnatural in German. A more natural phrasing would be "Integrieren Sie eine Raumauswahl" or "Fügen Sie eine Raumauswahl hinzu".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrieren Sie eine Raumauswahl, um Benutzern den Zugriff auf jeden Raum aus der Liste der verfügbaren Räume zu ermöglichen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'jeden Raum' feels slightly repetitive. A more concise phrasing could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrieren Sie eine Raumauswahl, um Benutzern den Zugriff auf alle Räume aus der Liste der verfügbaren Räume zu ermöglichen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation lacks the punctuation at the end of the sentence. A period should be added.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Incruste un selector de salas para permitir a los usuarios acceder a cualquier sala de la lista de salas disponibles.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and somewhat awkward. 'Upota huoneen valitsija salliaksesi käyttäjien päästä mihin tahansa saatavilla olevien huoneiden listalla olevaan huoneeseen' translates to 'Embed a room selector to allow users to access any room on the list of available rooms.' It's wordy and doesn't flow naturally in Finnish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Salli käyttäjien valita huone listaamastasi huonevalikoimasta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'saatavilla olevien huoneiden listalla olevaan huoneeseen' is grammatically correct but extremely verbose and convoluted. It could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Simplify the phrase to something more concise like 'huonevalikoimasta' or 'huoneista'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "հասանելիների ցանկից" (from the list of available ones) is slightly awkward in Armenian. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing. A better phrasing would convey the sense of 'available rooms'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Տեղադրեք սենյակի ընտրիչը, որպեսզի օգտվողները կարողանան մուտք գործել ցանկացած սենյակ առկայծենողների ցանկից։ (or) Տեղադրեք սենյակի ընտրիչը, որպեսզի օգտվողները կարողանան մուտք գործել հասանելի սենյակների ցանկից:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '임베드하세요' (imbed haseyo) directly translates to 'embed' which might sound technical and less natural for a user-facing description. A more approachable phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자가 이용 가능한 방 목록에서 모든 방에 액세스할 수 있도록 방 선택 기능을 추가하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'allow users to access' is quite literal.  A more natural phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자가 이용 가능한 방 목록에서 모든 방에 쉽게 접근할 수 있도록

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຝັງ' (fang) can be interpreted as 'bury' or 'embed' in the context. While 'embed' is acceptable, 'ຕັ້ງ' (tang) might be a more natural fit for a technical document, suggesting 'install' or 'implement'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕັ້ງຕົວເລືອກຫ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'ຈາກລາຍຊື່ຫ້ອງທີ່ມີຢູ່' can be simplified to improve flow. While technically correct, it's slightly verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຈາກບັນຊີລາຍຊື່ຫ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'pieejamo failu saraksta' (list of available files) does not accurately reflect the English phrase 'list of the available ones' which refers to rooms, not files. It implies a file list instead of a room list.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ieguliet telpu atlasītāju, lai ļautu lietotājiem piekļūt jebkurai telpai no pieejamo telpu saraksta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "openen" (to open) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'access' in this context. 'To access' implies being able to view or interact with, not just 'open'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integreer een kamer selectie zodat gebruikers toegang kunnen krijgen tot een willekeurige kamer uit de lijst met beschikbare kamers.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'kamer selectie' could be improved for better readability. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: kamerselectie

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Osadź selektor pokojów' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally. 'Osadź' can imply a more permanent embedding than intended. A more natural translation would be something like 'Dodaj selektor pokojów' or 'Umieść selektor pokojów'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dodaj selektor pokojów

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පවතින ලැයිස්තුවෙන් ඕනෑම කාමරයකට ප්‍රවේශයට පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට ඉඩ දීමට' doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Embed a room selector to allow users to access any room from the list of the available ones.' It's a bit too literal and verbose. 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට ඉඩ දීමට' translates to 'to give opportunity to users', which is not the core meaning of 'allow'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පවතින කාමරයන්ගෙන් අවශ්‍ය කාමරයකට පිවිසිය හැකි කාමර තෝරණයක් ස්ථාපනය කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට' appears to be a typo. It should likely be 'පරිශ්රමකරුවන්ට' (users) or 'භාවිතකරුවන්ට' (users).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්රමකරුවන්ට / භාවිතකරුවන්ට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vdelajte izbirnik sobe' is a bit awkward. 'Vdelajte' is a verb form that isn't the most natural way to express 'embed' in this context. A more fluent translation would be something like 'Integrirajte izbirnik sobe' or 'Vstavite izbirnik sobe'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrirajte izbirnik sobe

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase 's seznama razpoložljivih' sounds slightly formal and could be improved for clarity and flow. Consider restructuring it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: iz razpoložljivih sob

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'уградите' (ugradite) translates to 'install' or 'integrate'. 'Уградите' doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'embed' in this context. A better translation would convey the action of including or presenting the selector.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Укључите селектор собе да бисте корисницима омогуц́или приступ било којој просторији са листе доступних.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of 'просторији' (prostoriji) is less common than 'соби' (sobi) in this context.  It's more conversational to say 'соби' rather than 'просторији'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Укључите селектор собе да бисте корисницима омогуц́или приступ било којој соби са листе доступних.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Ugradite' (Embed) doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'allow users to access'. A more accurate translation would convey the concept of enabling or providing access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogućite selektor sobe da biste korisnicima omogućili pristup bilo kojoj prostoriji sa liste dostupnih.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prostoriji' is spelled correctly but might be slightly more formal than necessary. While acceptable, a slightly more conversational alternative might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'soba' instead of 'prostoriji', though 'prostoriji' is technically correct.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Kullanıcıların mevcut odalar listesinden herhangi bir odaya erişmesine izin vermek için bir oda seçici yerleştirin." while conveying the general idea, is a bit clunky and literal. A more natural translation would consider the flow and brevity of the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcıların mevcut odalar arasından seçim yapabilmesi için bir oda seçici ekleyin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Вбудуйте засіб вибору кімнати' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Ukrainian. A more natural phrasing would convey the 'Embed' action in a more user-friendly way.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Додайте засіб вибору кімнати (Add a room selector)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'щоб надати користувачам доступ' is correct but could be simplified for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: щоб користувачі могли отримати доступ (so users could access)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nhúng trình chọn phòng để cho phép người dùng truy cập bất kỳ phòng nào từ danh sách các phòng có sẵn.' is a literal translation but sounds slightly awkward in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the purpose of the room selector.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cung cấp trình chọn phòng để người dùng dễ dàng truy cập vào bất kỳ phòng nào trong danh sách.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '让用户能够访问允许列表中的房间' doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'allow users to access any room from the list of the available ones'. It implies the rooms are pre-approved or on an 'allow list,' which may not be the intended meaning. The original English suggests access to all available rooms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 嵌入房间选择器，让用户可以访问可用的房间。
